pages.text: $(b)Automation Machines$() help streamline your workflows. Place them strategically to automate tasks!
$(violet)Auto Crafter$()$(br)Automatically crafts items from input inventory.
$(violet)Block Miner$()$(br)Automatically breaks blocks in front of it.
$(violet)Growth Accelerator$()$(br)Speeds up crop and plant growth nearby.
$(violet)Block Placer$()$(br)Automatically places blocks from its inventory.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(l)Automation Tips:$()$(br2)• Chain machines together for complex automation$(br)• Use hoppers to transfer items$(br)• Power with redstone for control$(br)• Combine with growth accelerators for efficient farms!
